channel.title: Help with custom titlescreen
channel.description:
yo guys i tryed to add a custom titlescreen for my client, this is my command for it.
[code]aBackground_966 = new Sprite(titleStreamLoader, "titlebox", 0);[/code]
I got 4 errors with that, so i added an void, this is it
[code] private void loadTitleScreen() {[/code]
This is my error
[code]client.java:30: ';' expected private void loadTitleScreen() ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Help needed! Thanks

item.title: Help with custom titlescreen
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

yo guys i tryed to add a custom titlescreen for my client, this is my command for it.

aBackground_966 = new Sprite(titleStreamLoader, "titlebox", 0);

I got 4 errors with that, so i added an void, this is it

private void loadTitleScreen() {

This is my error

client.java:30: ';' expected private void loadTitleScreen() ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Help needed! Thanks
